name: IMMNZTN_LAST_REVIEW
description: The table holds the information about when and by whom the immunizations section has been reviewed.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: IMM_LST_REV_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item store the last instant when the immunization record is marked as reviewed.

columns.name: IMM_LST_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the last user who marked the immunizations history as reviewed.

columns.name: IMM_LST_REV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IMM_LST_REV_CSN_ID
columns.description: CSN of encounter during the last time the immunizations were reviewed.
